scenes.background: Monica folds her arms, looking concerned.
scenes.description: If we take too long, we might miss our deadline. What do you think?

options.text: We can manage our time better if we focus on the key tasks first.
options.analysis: You emphasized efficient time management while acknowledging the urgency, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I agree, we should prioritize speed to meet the deadline, but not at the expense of quality.
options.analysis: You supported the urgency while stressing the importance of quality, showing good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Honestly, the deadline is tight, but we need to ensure everything is done right.
options.analysis: You emphasized the importance of meeting the deadline, showing strong motivation but a lack of emotional perception and empathy.
